Issues which are closed can be reopened.","iconUrl":"https://jira.3esi-enersight.com/images/icons/statuses/closed.png","name":"Closed","id":"6","statusCategory":{"self":"https://jira.3esi-enersight.com/rest/api/2/statuscategory/3","id":3,"key":"done","colorName":"green","name":"Done"}},"components":[{"self":"https://jira.3esi-enersight.com/rest/api/2/component/11000","id":"11000","name":"Enersight Integration"}],"timeoriginalestimate":null,"description":"A few things about mapping the tax values in from Enersight to Esi.Manage:

1. Asset level tax information does not import for opportunities with only capital. 

2. The Asset level tax that does come through for opportunities with a PDS grouping key are nonsensical. I do not know how these values were determined upon import.

3. The Asset level tax will compound with default tax from the fiscal model configuration. I assumed that the asset level tax would override the higher level taxes.

My current solution is to # out the tax part of the import file and just use the default taxes under configuration only.

Stanar","active":true,"timeZone":"America/Edmonton"},"body":"{quote}1. Asset level tax information does not import for opportunities with only capital.{quote}
I would expect this to be the case, since enersight exports effective tax. You did not earn anything (spend only), therefore you did not pay any tax.

{quote}2. The Asset level tax that does come through for opportunities with a PDS grouping key are nonsensical. I do not know how these values were determined upon import.{quote}
The best course of action is to enter this issue into enersigh jira. enersight developers are best suited to answer this question.

{quote}3. The Asset level tax will compound with default tax from the fiscal model configuration. I assumed that the asset level tax would override the higher level taxes.{quote}
Correct. That's esi.manage tax model. But, at this point in time, where we get total effective tax from enersight, esi.manage user would use jurisdiction with no tax, since all tax will be calculated from asset level.

Let me know if my conclusions are wrong, so we can reopen this issue.","updateAuthor":{"self":"https://jira.3esi-enersight.com/rest/api/2/user?username=Predrag.Stanar","name":"Predrag.Stanar","key":"ID10120","emailAddress":"predrag.stanar@3esi-enersight.com","avatarUrls":{"48x48":"https://jira.3esi-enersight.com/secure/useravatar?ownerId=ID10120&avatarId=11100","24x24":"https://jira.3esi-enersight.com/secure/useravatar?size=small&ownerId=ID10120&avatarId=11100","16x16":"https://jira.3esi-enersight.com/secure/useravatar?size=xsmall&ownerId=ID10120&avatarId=11100","32x32":"https://jira.3esi-enersight.com/secure/useravatar?size=medium&ownerId=ID10120&avatarId=11100"},"displayName":"Predrag Stanar","active":true,"timeZone":"America/Edmonton"},"created":"2016-08-14T11:19:57.403-0600","updated":"2016-08-14T11:19:57.403-0600"},{"self":"https://jira.3esi-enersight.com/rest/api/2/issue/14556/comment/21581","id":"21581","author":{"self":"https://jira.3esi-enersight.com/rest/api/2/user?username=andy.czerwonka","name":"andy.czerwonka","key":"aczerwonka","emailAddress":"andy.czerwonka@3esi-enersight.com","avatarUrls":{"48x48":"https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/1a0c3df2aca627630d610a51d511ca00?d=mm&s=48","24x24":"https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/1a0c3df2aca627630d610a51d511ca00?d=mm&s=24","16x16":"https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/1a0c3df2aca627630d610a51d511ca00?d=mm&s=16","32x32":"https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/1a0c3df2aca627630d610a51d511ca00?d=mm&s=32"},"displayName":"Andy Czerwonka","active":true,"timeZone":"America/Edmonton"},"body":"Testing the JIRA->Discord machinery.
